title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 163.5 - Support for filings submitted on a file and use basis
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 163.5 - Support for filings submitted on a file and use basis

State Regulations

An insurer shall include support for all proposed changes specified in each filing submitted on a file and use basis. The support shall include the specific reasons for the proposed changes, and any other material information required by section
2304
of the Insurance Law (e.g., the underlying data upon which the change is based). Filings submitted on a file and use basis shall be subject to the superintendent's review in accordance with article 23 of the Insurance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
163.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
